note:
Harry is on a mission to make the world a happier, sexier, and more open place. His first step towards this goal was to publish a book about all his own (some might consider shameful) secrets, insecurities, and dating blunders. ‘So… This is Awkward’ tells the story of how he moved to New York, got into online dating, and discovered a brave new world of kink.

Harry has many future projects on the go, including more books and other, kinkier, endeavours, so if you’re feeling brave go check out his
